website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, versatile, supportive and comfortable. An all-around win.
pros: Genuine leather upper with round toe
Comes in black cow quilin, black king suede and cork montana at Zappos
Amazon offers aubergine suede and chianti crinkle patent
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. These shoes have no padding even though the shoe looks like it would...I literally feel the ground as I am walking. Also the buckle cuts into my ankle. I love the style. However these shoes are not for a person who is on their feet for long periods of time (I am a Flight Attendant).
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: Even with all of my feet issues, these are comfortable for several hours!
customer_reviews.text: I got these in size 9... I wear orthotic inserts (plantar fasciitis), I have bunions, I have high arches, & I'm usually on my feet for several hours at a time... and these shoes are pretty comfortable! I'm not sure why the mixed reviews, maybe the sizing for others isn't quite right?? Idk!?? All I can say is with all of my feet issues, these are comfortable for several hours! I would like to get them in a basic black leather, but the price is a bit steep for me. If this helps give thumb up.
customer_reviews.author: travelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Got an 8. 5 which I usually wear, ...
customer_reviews.text: Got an 8.5 which I usually wear, but these are a wee bit tight across the toes, and I have narrow feet. For this brand shoe, I would go up only 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I’m a flight attendant and having shoes that last and are cute as well as comfortable is a must! My last pair lasted three years !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: But overall they are very comfortable, and definitely walk-able heels
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoes fit as expected. It's the bridge part runs a little bit small. But overall they are very comfortable, and definitely walk-able heels. I would recommend them for sure, but order 1/2 size up for head and bridge part.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: The ball of the shoe is too thin! You feel every step!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks good and seems to be durable but if you plan to wear them all day they are not comfortable. The ball of the shoe is very thin so you feel every step. I'm a flight attendant and walk a lot.. This is not the shoe for standing or walking. If you have a desk job you may be OK as long as you don't have to walk much to get to work. As far as the fit goes, it's true to size and fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Halfhill

customer_reviews.title: I wanted them to fit so bad!
customer_reviews.text: First off, these shoes are adorable! They looked in the pictures just like they look in real life. Typically I wear a 7.5 in dress shoes and an 8 in athletic shoes. Often if size 7.5 dress shoe doesn't fit, I need to size down to a 7. These were too small. I wasn't even sure that a 8 would have worked comfortably, as the width seemed narrow, also. Not one to buy multiples of the same shoe in different sizes, and send the ill fitting pairs back: I just returned them and received a refund. But if you want to take the chance on sizing, the shoes were super cute and appeared to be well made!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Uncommonly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most Sofft shoes are comfortable, but these Miranda's are surprising. They are the most tolerable 3 inch heels I have ever worn. I stood for five hours at a holiday party and was not in pain. I own and love the classic black leather. This was my second pair, ordered in the distressed aluminum. They were too sparkley to match the dress I needed them for, so I exchanged for a different style of Sofft pumps. Most shoes I wear a 9 with woolen socks and an insole, so these must run slightly small since a 9 fit me wearing just nylons.
customer_reviews.author: Zor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all day shoe
customer_reviews.text: Go with the 1/2 size, I wear a seven but 7.5 is so comfortable. 7 fits just a bit tight, but 7.5 can wear right out of the box. Such a great style I wish it came in more colors I would buy color.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Robins

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were beautiful, soft and the color and the heel height were what I wanted, but I usually wear a size 5.5-6 medium and have narrow feet. They didn’t have a size 5.5 so I ordered a 6. When I tried them on, my feet sledded forward leaving a big space in the back. At that point, I felt it didn’t matter what size, either 5.5 or 6 it was not going to fit right on me. If however, you have wide feet, it may work for you. One more important thing, I returned the shoes, but they took almost $5 for shipping which was not fair. Look for free returns when you purchase these shoes. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful color and goes well with black, greens and purples. I wear suits to work and this style shoe ads a trendy flair to a boring suit. Love the fit, I wear am 11 medium and can wear all day on the job without any foot pain. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Shells Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size small.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and comfortable shoe. Following other reviews, I ordered a size up (I normally wear a size 7.5, and usually prefer a C width) and got size 8 which fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: GenX

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to shoes for whatever outfit I am wearing goes perfect with boot cut jeans skinny jeans dresses leggings skirts perfect for summer winter fall I bought these in black and cognac I wish they had different colors I would buy all of them the shoes came quickly packaged as it should have been the price is fairly high however due to my plantar fasciitisI will spend money on a good quality shoe
customer_reviews.author: Leilaniocky

customer_reviews.title: A dark eggplant Burgundy color
customer_reviews.text: For starters, these shoes are absolutely stunning! Not too tall, and allows for sturdy footing. These shoes are comfortable and have a nice padded insole. I was a bit concerned about the color. They are a purplish mocha Burgundy color. Want to wear them with a black dress and has enough of the purplish Burgundy to not be mistaken as brown. The leather has a beautiful and sleek look that you would want in a professional shoe. Very well made. I would definitely order these again in another color.
customer_reviews.author: belinda b.

customer_reviews.title: Flight Attendant Approved
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews said to order up. I'm a 8.5 (39 EU) I have avaragr size feet and width. I kinda wish I didn't listen to some of the reviews because I orderer a 9. Honestly, wish I just got the 8.5 because they do as most shoes stretch a little over time. But comfort is AMAZING I WEAR THEM ALL DAY UP TO 14+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Paul harris

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy if you have to walk or stand a lot while wearing heels but it’s not too sexy. I can see why these appeal to flight attendants. Looks cute on them but not on me *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Tight, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought my usual size, but I found these tight and very uncomfortable-- way too much pressure on my toes. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Joycocello

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and runs small
customer_reviews.text: Cute comfy but not true to size Too narrow and at least a half to a whole size too small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Good sole padding and love the burnished gold color. They are very different from any other shoe I own.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: Adorable shoe with good arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these shoes. The color is a distressed silver, which I think is very cool. They look great with retro styled dresses and jeans. They are also pretty comfortable with nice arch support.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: and pretty comfy! they just seem to run a little ...
customer_reviews.text: They’re very cute, and pretty comfy! they just seem to run a little small. A 7 usually fits perfectly, but in this case I couldn’t done a half size up
customer_reviews.author: Maeghan Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Flight attendant shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a true size 7 and they fit perfectly. I wear these shoes for work. I’m a flight attendant. Other shoes may have lasted me 6 months before they were done. These can last me over a year! They take a long time to stretch out and get too loose. They are still shiny, and I polish them maybe once or twice in their lifetime. I recommend these shoes to all my flight attendant friends. I can walk long distances and stand for a long time in them. Even after a year, my arch still feels supported.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Venable

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Professional looking
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and professional I am getting another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: A little tight at first, but they break in well.
customer_reviews.text: I have these in cognac and black and I LOVE them! I wear them to work regularly and they are super comfortable. They go perfectly with my vintage style dresses, I just love the classic look of this heel.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cute but School Marmy
customer_reviews.text: I wish the heal was a bit more refined. These don't work with with nicer dresses...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Girl

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Comfort, adorable and good price. I have them in many colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This brand runs a tad small. I always go up a half size and find a good fit. Great and comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: picture is accurate, perhaps a little less metallic in person
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Unique "foil" color, not charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Color truly is like distressed foil. Color didn't work, but I bought the same shoe in Claret. This style, and brand, is SO comfortable, all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but small
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but it does run at least a half size small. I will have to return and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K. Maphet

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I walk miles in these shoes. The strap could be longer. The strap does not fill all the way through the holder after last buckle hole. It is not very noticeable. But I would not wear them for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Noise shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoes look good but when you walk it makes noise like you if they were Payless shoes. I’m still pending refund or exchange
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, but this particular style runs very small. I gave them to my sister, who wears between an 8-1/2 and a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R. Wittekind

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes. Ordered in the brown too!
customer_reviews.text: Like the mary jane style, it's a classic. And also the heel hight. Can dress up or casual.
customer_reviews.author: P. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Sofft is my go-to for formal work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I am a flight attendant, and this pair of shoes is the best I have ever felt on my feet. I actually think they are better than Aerosoles because they are cuter . The shoes can last me for a good 5 to 6 flights a day or 16 hours of work.
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, and held up to running through O'Hare ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, and held up to running through O'Hare and DFW airports, even after they changed my gate THREE TIMES in under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the sofft shoes, so comfortable! The strap placement is perfect and it doesn’t hurt my high arches.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these to work. Good bend in the middle. Gives my 5 foot 3 inches some height.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9 so I ordered a half size bigger... I should have gone a full size bigger. The shoes are very pretty... but too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jennefer Tabares

customer_reviews.title: Fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes and the cognac pair to a week long work conference at Disneyland and made it in the park 6:30 am to 12:30pm until starting to have foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfy for work. I bought these in the blue, black and brown before they're discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Bidrussian

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I have four colors of the same. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Maria José Romero

customer_reviews.title: Flight attendant dream
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! I’m a flight attendant and have gone through 4 different types of brands (very expensive) and now I have finally found the perfect shoe. I have flat feet a bunion on my right foot. These shoes have made changed my life! (Give them two uses to break in)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These run small. Order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9, which is my normal size and had to return them. Ordered a size 10!!! And they are still very tight in the toe area. I’m hoping with some wear they will stretch out and be more comfortable. Right now I can only wear them for a few hours before I’m in serious pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bunston

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the sole
customer_reviews.text: Great balanced easy to wear all day heels. A little tight the first day but they break in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L. Jackiewicz

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. They seem quality.. they are not uncomfortable thankfully
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable heals.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I am a flight attendant and this is my 3rd pair. Great arch support and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these expensive beautiful shoes and the heel makes nois3
customer_reviews.author: Valleris Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoes for when I have walk to several work meetings.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cristales

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe...super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is well made, super comfortable inside. Very stylish and i'm happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Parks

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: You are definitely getting what you pay for. These shoes are very comfortable and go with almost anything I wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are a timeless beauty. You can wear them with jeans to add some class to your outfit
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Cote

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love Sofft brand. I run around in heels all day for work and I now wear almost primarily his brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kates

customer_reviews.title: My daughter in law loved these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I gift for my daughter in law. She gasped when she saw them! They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these shoes! Love them! Very comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Snake skin pattern looks printed on.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Color was VERY dark and the snake skin looked as though it was printed on. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mantanona

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but they run a little small. I got a half size larger than normal and they are still a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a heel person these days... love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pnwrose

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little small in the vamp of right shoe. I am stretching with shoe tree.
customer_reviews.author: J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are comfortable and stylish. You can wear them with dresses, pants or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gold suede shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. The color is amazing and they are very comfortable. They do run a bit small so I sized one size up and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

product_meta.title: Sofft - Womens - Miranda
product_meta.description: A fusion of modern and vintage style.
